summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingDrunk Elephant's ceramide-rich E-Rase Milki Micellar Water gently removes makeup, dirt, pollution, and bacteria from the face and eye area without sensitization, irritation, or stripping skin's acid mantle.
details: DetailsBenefitsNourishes skin while dissolving away makeup and dirtGentle enough to be used all over, including eyes and lipsUse anytime you need a quick skin refreshmentFormulated at a skin-friendly, non-stripping pH of 5.0Dermatologist TestedKey IngredientsMicellar Cleansing Blend: A mix of ultra-gentle, dirt- and pollution-capturing surfactants and emollients.3-Ceramide Blend: Ceramides AP, NP, and EOP are plant-derived and identical to the wax-like moisturizing substance that occurs naturally in skin. Ceramides help fill the spaces between skin cells, give the appearance of elasticity & maintain the moisture balance of skin.Wild Melon Seed Oil: Cold pressed and rich in omega 6 and 9 fatty acids (linoleic and oleic) as well as antioxidant polyphenols, it's used for its soothing, moisturizing & barrier-supportive benefits.Formulated WithoutMade without the Suspicious 6 - the six ingredients Drunk Elephant believes are at the root of almost every skin issue (Essential oils, Silicones, Chemical sunscreens, SLS, Fragrances + dyes, and Drying alcohols)Item 2588459How To UseShake before use. Gently smooth over face, eyes, and lips with a soft cotton pad, holding for a few seconds on heavily made-up areas. Don't scrub, tug, or rub. May also be used anytime in between facial cleansing - no need to rinse. Skin feels clean, cool, and soft after each use.How to Recycle:Unscrew and remove the cap, recycle both pieces.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Cetearyl Isononanoate, Propanediol, C15-19 Alkane, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Heptyl Undecylenate, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Adansonia Digitata Seed Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Schinziophyton Rautanenii Kernel Oil, Tocopherol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Seed Oil, Ximenia Americana Seed Oil, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP, Ceramide NP, Cholesterol, Phytosphingosine, Xanthan Gum, Carbomer, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Polysorbate 20, Ethylhexylglycerin.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Shake before use. Gently smooth over face, eyes, and lips with a soft cotton pad, holding for a few seconds on heavily made-up areas. Don't scrub, tug, or rub. May also be used anytime in between facial cleansing - no need to rinse. Skin feels clean, cool, and soft after each use.How to Recycle:Unscrew and remove the cap, recycle both pieces.

reviews.headline: I will buy this again
reviews.comments: Clean , refreshing and easy to use. I like the way it makes my skin feel. Soft and refreshed

reviews.headline: Love this stuff
reviews.comments: Because of this micellar water, I actually have started washing my face at night for the first time in my life. It is so easy to use and it doesn't irritate my rosacea. A bottle lasts a long time, too.

reviews.headline: Love how this settles into skin
reviews.comments: I was gifted by drunk elephant their Milki Micellar water and I must say it is so refreshing on the face, I've been using it after I cleanse and wash my face because they say you don't need to rub it off you can just let it saturate into the skin and they are totally right. It doesn't feel too slimey or heavy when sitting on your face at all. The consistency of this water is so gentle and calming on my face

reviews.headline: Love the texture
reviews.comments: I love how gently this micellar water removes makeup and dirt, leaving my skin feeling clean and refreshed without any rinsing required. This is seriously the perfect way to freshen up my skin throughout the day, especially when I'm going makeup-free. It's super easy to use - just a quick shake and then smooth it over my face with a cotton pad. Plus, the milky texture feels so nourishing on my skin, and gives me an extra boost of hydration. I'm totally obsessed with how soft and cool my skin feels after using it. I received this product complimentary from Drunk Elephant in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.headline: Good!
reviews.comments: I really love their cleanser, and this one is just as good! It has a beautiful texture that gently removes makeup without irritating my eyes. It says no rinse, but I prefer to wash it off anyway simply because I feel like acne-prone skin is safer that way. Love it! Gifted by Drunk Elephant.

reviews.headline: Buy it
reviews.comments: Super gentle but efficient in removing makeup and debris from my face. Doesn't break me out and leaves my skin feeling soft and moisturized. It doesn't have a scent which I appreciate. The packaging is also nice. Gifted by drunkelephant

reviews.headline: Love love love
reviews.comments: This is by far, the most gentle micellar water that I have ever used! It's milky, has nourishing oils inside, so it really breaks down everything that you're wearing sort of like an oil cleanser would but even more gentle than oil cleansing - if that's even possible. It leaves my skin so fresh and hydrated. I couldn't be more obsessed! Gifted by drunk elephant for my honest review

reviews.headline: Skin feels clean!
reviews.comments: This did a really good job cleaning off my makeup. I wouldn't say it's extraordinarily different than any other misceller water but it did leave my skin feeling very clean and not dry. This was gifted to me by drunk elephant

reviews.headline: Removed everything
reviews.comments: I love this micellar water from drunk elephant! I have sensitive skin so it's always scary for me to try products like this but it works perfectly and really helps soothe my skin as take off The makeup you thought you got off. Offered by drunk elephant

reviews.headline: Removes it all
reviews.comments: I love this micellar water from drunk elephant! I have sensitive skin so it's always scary for me to try products like this but it works perfectly and really helps soothe my skin as take off The makeup you thought you got off. Offered by drunk elephant

reviews.headline: Highly recommend
reviews.comments: I received the E-Rase Milki Micellar Water gifted by Drunk Elephant and I am absolutely in love with it. I was surprised at how smooth it left my face feeling and it made my face feel clean. This product does not make my face feel dry or stripped whatsoever. Highly recommend.

reviews.headline: New makeup remover essential
reviews.comments: This micellar water is my new favorite! It removed my makeup gently and didn't sting my eyes at all, which always happens to me with removers. I love how it makes me skin feel clean and soft afterwards. I also love how I don't have to rinse again. Gifted by Drunkelephant.

reviews.headline: Definitely recommend
reviews.comments: Absolutely love this makeup remover!! Of course it's going to be amazing just as expected gifted by drunk elephant ! It doesn't dry out your face at all and doesn't leave that tight dry feeling after! I love how it removes absolutely everything even that hard to remove waterproof mascara! Definitely recommend it leaves your face feeling hydrated and clean at the same time!!

reviews.headline: I love this
reviews.comments: The best powder puff. I love how the price point is and it works really well. Better than most puffs. I definitely recommend it and use it for setting my face with powder. I love how smooth it applies

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: A nice micellar water to help get rid of your stubborn mascara and eye liner. It does a great job at cleansing the face. I have sensitive skin and sometimes micellar water can irritate my face but this one doesn't seem to. Gifted by drunk elephant for my honest review

reviews.headline: Gentle and feels nice, could clean a little better
reviews.comments: This is a nice concept and definitely feels gentle and smooth on the skin. It doesn't leave my skin feeling stripped, but I do have to say that it didn't feel like I was getting as deep of a clean as when I use my usual micellar water (I use both with the same cotton pads). It didn't irritate my eyes or make my contacts blurry, but I felt like I either needed to use more product or spend extra time to totally remove my relatively light eye makeup. Maybe it's just a learning curve as to how much to use or it would work better with a denser, less fluffy cotton pad. Gifted by Drunk Elephant

reviews.headline: Loved it
reviews.comments: The E-rase Micellar Water by Drunk Elephant is a gentle yet effective makeup remover and cleanser. It efficiently lifts away impurities and makeup without stripping the skin of its natural oils. It's suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin, and leaves the skin feeling refreshed and hydrated. Overall, it's a solid choice for anyone looking for a fuss-free cleansing solution. Offered by drunkelephant

reviews.headline: Fragrance free
reviews.comments: This product was gifted by drunkelephant and love it because it does not have a strong fragrance at all! This misceller waters I've tried in the past always had a strong fragrance. The product comes out as a whitish, clear color and removes my make up quickly and easily!

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: This micellar water doubles as an excellent makeup remover. I've struggled with removing stubborn mascaras in the past, but this product effortlessly tackles the task. It's a win-win situation for me, and I'll certainly be buying it again!Gifted by Drunk Elephant.

reviews.headline: Refreshed my face
reviews.comments: I love how this makes me feel like I just got out the shower with a clean face! I am usually a bit skeptical with products but this was and is AMAZING stuff! The packaging is so nice too and I can already tell that this will be a top tier make up remover offered by drunkelephant

values.label: Small bottle, might run out fast

display_values: Small bottle, might run out fast

media.headline: Great for removing makeup with ease
media.caption: after

media.headline: Great for removing makeup with ease
media.caption: Before

faceoff_positive.comments:
I'll start with the good. This product feels good when applied to my face. It's not drying, and the fragrance is not overpowering (although it is a little funky smelling for). The scent reminds me of rice ferment, which I actually don't dislike. This product is definitely not bad.
I cannot justify the price though. I use it after working out before I shower, so I cannot speak to its makeup removal properties bc all it removes is my sunscreen and sweat before I shower. It's definitely meant to be a leave-on treatment bc the runoff stings my eyes in the shower if I don't cleanse right away. i cannot recommend bc I could arguably get the same results from a lower priced micellar water (and have, from Vichy's micellar for sensitive skin). As someone that is willing to invest into higher end products (I am a big fan of Dr Jart, Fresh, Dear Klairs, Josie Maran, Typology, and Sunday Riley leave-on products and use Dermalogica pre-cleanse and daily microfoliant) but especially since I wash this off almost immediately after use when it is meant to be left on it's just not a good fit for me.
a
Arguably, I could save money by using my Dermalogica cleansing oil in the morning, too, but I prefer the no-fuss of using micellar in the morning, especially since I'm only removing residue from my night routine, sunscreen, and sweat.
faceoff_positive.headline: meh. it's okay.

faceoff_negative.comments: I was extremely disappointed in this product. I'm an avid makeup wearer and liberal double-cleanser. I tried this out as my first step in my nightly regimen and found myself going through so much cotton to get my makeup off compared to other brands (La Roche Posay and IT Cosmetics). The texture was goopy and extremely heavy even for a dry skin person like myself. It left an uncomfortable texture behind so I wouldn't recommend this for people who want a no-rinse cleanser either. Also was not a fan of the scent. Smells like stale Play-Doh.
faceoff_negative.headline: Really Wanted to Love Thisâ€¦
